name: RLS Opportunity
description:
The ship is being attacked by pirates and you have been cut off from the rest of the ship in the engineering core. Only you can save the ship and her crew by repairing the main core and restarting the hyperdrive. Can you do it before time runs out?

RLS Opportunity is a VR Sci-Fi escape room. You are tasked with searching the ship to find a way to repair the hyperdrive. Led by Chief engineer Lucas Henrison you must juggle and move the modules around to open and unlock the doors to find all the tools you need.

Playable on the HTC Vive

Made by Jake Nash and Micah Smith
